title: new_core: org.apache.solr.common.SolrException:org.apache.solr.common.SolrException: Could not load conf for core new_core: Error loading solr config from /home/madguy02/solr/server/solr/new_core/conf/solrconfig.xml

comments.content:
This is not an appropriate use of Solr's JIRA, we try to reserve the JIRA system for code issues rather than usage questions.

Please ask the question here: solr-user@lucene.apache.org, see: http://lucene.apache.org/solr/community.html#mailing-lists-irc

When you raise question on the user's list, include pertinent details, including the stack trace from Solr's log.

Likely in this case you have some syntax error in your solrconfig file. Again, the log will show you additional details.
comments.author: Erick Erickson
